title: Saints and Soldiers 2003 DVDR R4 NTSC ENG
description:
Saints and Soldiers is based on the terrible Massacre of Malmedy. In December 1944 Hitler's army began a strong offensive to allies, known as the Battle of the Bulge. The cable Nathan and his friend Sergeant Gordon Gunderson are caught with a hundred other American soldiers by the Germans. Confusion created by one of the soldiers results in a heavy fire that kills almost all Americans. Nathan Gordon and some more soldiers manage to escape through the woods. No weapons, food, or shelter to survive the harsh winter, they are behind enemy lines and need to get to the other side.
